scripts.deploy-v10: sls fauna deploy -c serverless-v10.yml && sls fauna remove -c serverless-v10.yml
scripts.deploy-v4: sls fauna deploy -c serverless-v4.yml && sls fauna remove -c serverless-v4.yml
scripts.help: sls fauna --help -c serverless-v10.yml && sls fauna deploy --help -c serverless-v10.yml && sls fauna remove --help -c serverless-v10.yml
